tier.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create certain objects with +4 in the Logging, Foraging, and Dowsing craft skills.

tech.tech-subdesc: Augments the damage and the chance to hit when the Powershot ability is used.
Augments the damage and the chance to hit when the Smash ability is used.
Augments the damage and the chance to hit when the Powerstrike ability is used.
Enhances the Augmentation skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Users of this technique may also wish to consider placing dyes on their invisible armor.
Enhances the Blight skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Blight skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Bow skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Bow skill reduces the damage variance when using weapons of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Crossbow skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Crossbow skill reduces the damage variance when using weapons of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the Dragon Breath skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Dragon Breath skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Energy skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Energy skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Flame skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Flame skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Ice skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Ice skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Life skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Life skill reduces the healing variance when using spells of this type.
Enhances the Mind skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Mind skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Nature skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Nature skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the One Hand Crush skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased One Hand Crush skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the One Hand Pierce skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased One Hand Pierce skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the One Hand Slash skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased One Hand Slash skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the Tooth and Claw skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Tooth and Claw skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Primal skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Primal skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Spirit skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Spirit skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the Two Hand Crush skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Two Hand Crush skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.

Enhances the Two Hand Slash skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Two Hand Slash skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Enhances the Unarmed skill of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased Unarmed skill reduces the damage variance when using attacks of this type, as well as improving the chance to hit.
Improves the Alchemy skill by a set amount per tier. Alchemists make consumable, player-beneficial items from all resources (with an emphasis on organic).
Improves the Armorcraft skill by a set amount per tier. Armorcrafters (Armorcrafters, Outfitters) make armors from processed metal resources.
Improves the Carpentry skill by a set amount per tier. Carpenters use wood resources to build player-owned structures.
Improves the Clothworking skill by a set amount per tier. Clothworkers (Outfitters, Tailors, Tinkerers, Weavers) make cloth-based items from specific organic resources.
Improves the Cooking skill by a set amount per tier. Confectioners make edible food of culinary worth.
Improves the Crystalshaping skill by a set amount per tier.
Improves the Earthencraft skill by a set amount per tier. Earthencrafters (Alchemists, Confectioners, Tinkerers) use stone-based resources to make Pottery and Glassblowing items.
Improves the Enchanting skill by a set amount per tier. Enchanters modify natural and processed resources into exotic resources for use in elder game trade skills.
Improves the Essence Harvesting skill by a set amount per tier. Essence Harvesters (Alchemists, Enchanters, Gatherers, Scholars, Spellcrafters, Dragons) gather magic resources.

Improves the Essence Shaping skill by a set amount per tier. Essence Shapers (Alchemists, Enchanters, Gatherers, Scholars, Spellcrafters, Dragons) make items from magic resources and process magic resources.
Improves the Essence Structuring skill by a set amount per tier. Essence Structurers use magic resources to build player-owned structures.

Improves the Fishing skill by a set amount per tier. Fishermen (Blacksmiths, Confectioners, Gatherers) make fishing poles and tackle, and gather fish and other exotic resources when adjacent to in-game water sources (resource nodes).
Improves the Fitting skill by a set amount per tier. Fitters use metal resources to build player-owned structures.

Improves the Fletching skill by a set amount per tier. Fletchers (Blacksmiths, Fletchers) make melee and ranged weaponry from processed wood resources and maybe one day make arrows from processed wood and organic resources.
Improves the Foraging skill by a set amount per tier. Foragers (Alchemists, Confectioners, Gatherers, Outfitters, Tailors, Weavers) gather organic resources.

Improves the Gemworking skill by a set amount per tier. Gemworkers (Blacksmiths, Jewelers, Miners, Dragons) make items from precious and rare stone resources, and process precious and rare stone resources into items used in other trade skills.
Improves the Jewelcraft skill by a set amount per tier. Jewelcrafters make wearable accessories from common and precious (processed) stone and metal resources.
Improves the Lairshaping skill by a set amount per tier.
Improves the Leatherworking skill by a set amount per tier. Leatherworkers (Outfitters, Tailors, Tinkerers, Weavers) make hide-based items from specific organic resources.
Improves the Logging skill by a set amount per tier. Loggers (Blacksmiths, Carpenters, Gatherers) gather wood resources.
Improves the Lumbering skill by a set amount per tier. Lumberers (Blacksmiths, Carpenters, Fletchers, Gatherers) process wood resources.
Improves the Masonry skill by a set amount per tier. Masons use stone resources to build player-owned structures.
Improves the Metalworking skill by a set amount per tier. Metalworkers (Blacksmiths, Fitters, Tinkerers, Weaponsmiths) make items from metal resources and process metal resources.
Improves the Mining skill by a set amount per tier. Miners (Armorers, Blacksmiths, Fitters, Jewelers, Miners, Outfitters, Weaponsmiths, Dragons) gather metal resources.
Improves the Quarrying skill by a set amount per tier. Quarriers (Alchemists, Blacksmiths, Masons, Miners, Scholars, Spellcrafters, Dragons) gather stone resources.

Improves the Salvaging skill by a set amount per tier. Salvagers (Enchanters, Gatherers, Miners, Tinkerers, Dragons) deconstruct non-magic resource-based items to get back a percentage of the resources used to make the item optimally.
Improves the Scalecraft skill by a set amount per tier. Scalecrafters (Dragons) make dragon-only items from stone and metal resources that bestow benefits when "worn" by a dragon.
Improves the Sculpting skill by a set amount per tier. Sculpters (Blacksmiths, Masons, Scholars, Spellcrafters, Tinkerers) make items from stone resources.
Improves the Smelting skill by a set amount per tier. Smelters (Armorers, Blacksmiths, Fitters, Jewelers, Miners, Outfitters, Weaponcrafters, Dragons) process metal resources.
Improves the Spellcraft skill by a set amount per tier. Spellcrafters (Scholars, Spellcrafters, Dragons) make spell scrolls used by magic schools from various resources.
Improves the Spinning skill by a set amount per tier. Spinners (Outfitters, Tailors, Weavers) process fabric-based resources.
Improves the Stoneworking skill by a set amount per tier. Stoneworkers (Blacksmiths, Masons, Miners, Spellcrafters, Dragons) process stone resources.
Improves the Tailoring skill by a set amount per tier. Tailors make cloth-based armors, hide-based armors, and clothing processed organic resources.
Improves the Tanning skill by a set amount per tier. Tanners (Outfitters, Tailors, Weavers) process hide-based resources.
Improves the Tinkering skill by a set amount per tier. Tinkerers make player-beneficial (sometimes consumable) items from all resources (with an emphasis on metal).

Improves the Transmutation skill by a set amount per tier. Transmutators (Enchanters, Dragons) create processed resources from differing processed resources and convert processed resources into their natural resource forms.
Improves the Weaponcraft skill by a set amount per tier. Weaponcrafters (Blacksmiths, Weaponcrafters) make melee and ranged weapons from processed metal resources.
Improves the Weaving skill by a set amount per tier. Weavers use organic resources to build player-owned structures.
Improves the Woodworking skill by a set amount per tier. Woodworkers (Blacksmith, Carpenters, Fletchers, Tinkerers) make items from wood resources.

Improves the Alchemist's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Armorer's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Carpenter's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Confectioner's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Fitter's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Fletcher's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Gatherer's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Jeweler's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Mason's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Miner's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Spellcrafter's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Tailor's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Tinkerer's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Weaponsmith's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.

Improves the Weaver's skillset by a small amount per tier. Although not as beneficial as the individual techniques, it provides a cheap way to attain such bonuses without the difficulty of obtaining the components.
Enhances the Armor of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased armor will help better protect against incoming melee attacks by reducing the damage taken by each blow.
Enhances the blight resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher blight resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy blight attacks.
Enhances the blight warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved blight warding will help reduce the chance of enemy blight attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the Blocking capability of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased blocking skill will help prevent enemy melee attacks from hitting the player.
Enhances the crush resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher crush resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemies that use crushing attacks.
Enhances the crush warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved crush warding will help reduce the chance of enemy crushing attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the energy resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher energy resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy energy attacks.
Enhances the energy warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved energy warding will help reduce the chance of enemy energy attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the flame resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher flame resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy flame attacks.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the flame warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved flame warding will help reduce the chance of enemy flame attacks taking hold on the player.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the ice resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher ice resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy ice attacks.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the ice warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved ice warding will help reduce the chance of enemy ice attacks taking hold on the player.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the life resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher life resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy life attacks.
Enhances the life warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved life warding will help reduce the chance of enemy life attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the mind resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher mind resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy mind attacks.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the mind warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved mind warding will help reduce the chance of enemy mind attacks taking hold on the player.

tech-attributes.tech-attribute: Mind Bender of the Crimson Scourge

tech.tech-subdesc: Enhances the nature resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher nature resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy nature attacks.
Enhances the nature warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved nature warding will help reduce the chance of enemy nature attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the Parrying capability of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased the parry skill will help prevent enemy melee attacks from hitting the player.
Enhances the pierce resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher pierce resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemies that use piercing attacks.
Enhances the pierce warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved pierce warding will help reduce the chance of enemy piercing attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the primal resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher primal resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy primal attacks.
Enhances the primal warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved primal warding will help reduce the chance of enemy primal attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the slash resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher slash resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemies that use slashing attacks.
Enhances the slash warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved slash warding will help reduce the chance of enemy slashing attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the spirit resistance of the player by a set amount per tier. Higher spirit resistance will help reduce the damage taken from enemy spirit attacks.
Enhances the spirit warding of the player by a set amount per tier. Improved spirit warding will help reduce the chance of enemy spirit attacks taking hold on the player.
Enhances the Ethereal Armor of the player by a set amount per tier. Increased etheral armor will help better protect against incoming magical attacks by reducing the damage taken by each spell.
Increases the dexerity of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Dexterity predominantly benefits the melee based skills and evasion.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +20 to the Dexterity statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +25 to the Dexterity statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the focus of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Focus predominantly benefits magic based skills.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +20 to the Focus statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +25 to the Focus statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the health of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). More useful for the schools that take alot of physical/magical damage, and those with low evasion skills.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +20 to the Health statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +25 to the Health statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the power of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Power predominantly benefits magical based skills and spells. As well as increasing the average spell damage, this technique will also aid slightly many of the ethereal craft skills.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +20 to the Power statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +25 to the Power statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the runing speed of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Most useful to crafters who have to do alot of travelling, but also useful for players/classes that kite their prey.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +10 to the Speed statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +12 to the Speed statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the strength of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Strength predominantly benefits the melee based skills. As well as increasing the average combat damage, this technique will also aid slightly many of the physical craft skills.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +20 to the Strength statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +25 to the Strength statistic.

tech.tech-subdesc: Increases the health and armor of the player by a small amount. It is usually better to instead apply the health and armor techniques instead.
Increases the flying speed of the player by a set amount (depending on tier). Currently only applicable to dragons.

tier-attributes.tier-desc: This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +10 to the Flight Speed statistic.
This technique gives the user the ability to create objects with an additional +12 to the Flight Speed statistic.
